name: Unstable Concoction
description:
A game about discovering and crafting potions.

How to play:
  1. Drag the ingredients into the cauldron
  2. Once you decide on a recipe, click on the brew button to start brewing
  3. When brewing starts drag the stick and stir the cauldron and collect 10 potions to finish the potion

You will get orders on the left panel. Once the required potion is brewed sell them to get the next order.

Find all the potions to win the game.
